methods.title: Name
methods.description:
Public name of the contributor. If no public name is set,
it defaults to the real name.

methods.title: Real name
methods.description: You should use `contributor.name` as display name.

methods.title: Public name
methods.description: You should use `contributor.name` as display name.

methods.title: Contribution role
methods.description:
A role is only available for `episode.contributors` and `podcast.contributors`,
not if you access the global `contributors` directly.

methods.title: Contribution group
methods.description:
A group is only available for `episode.contributors` and `podcast.contributors`,
not if you access the global `contributors` directly.

methods.title: Avatar image
methods.description:
Dimensions default to 50x50px.
Change it via parameter: `contributor.avatar(32)`

methods.title: Avatar image URL
methods.description:
Dimensions default to 50x50px.
Change it via parameter: `contributor.avatarUrl(32)`

methods.title: Flattr URL.
methods.description:
When on a WordPress page, it returns the URL for the person. Otherwise a
URL for that person _in this specific episode_ is generated.

methods.title: List of service profiles
methods.description: Parameters: - **type:** (optional) "social", "donation" or "all". Default: "all" Example: ```html {% for service in contributor.services({type: "social"}) %} {% endfor %} ```
